page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: The last village school to close was at Tarrant Gunville about 8 years ago. The children from Gunville and Hinton now go to first school at Pimperne and Milldown Middle and Blandford Upper School. From Chettle they go to Sixpenny Handley then Wimborne. School buses provide free transport from chosen points long the route. Some chidren are educated privately in other areas. There is a newly-formed playgroup serving the Upper Tarrant Valley which meets in Tarrant Gunvill village hall. The old school building at Tarrant Hinton is now an immaculate private house, that at Gunville is owned by an enthusiastic orchid growing expert who has given much of the house over to their cultivation.
